class inspect_ai_scorers.fact_comparator.FactComparator(model)[source]

Bases: object

A class to compare facts between context and answer using an AI model.

calculate_metrics(comparison_result)[source]

Calculate groundedness and thoroughness metrics based on the comparison results.

Parameters:

comparison_result (ComparisonResult) – The result of the fact comparison.

Returns:

The calculated metrics.

Return type:

dict

  • answer_text (str) – The answer text.

Bases: object

A class to evaluate prompts using an AI model.

process_data(final_result)[source]

Process the final result and determine the pass value.

Parameters:

final_result (str) – The final result from the model.

Returns:

The pass value (1 if “PASS” is in the result, 0 if “FAIL” is in the result, otherwise -1).

Return type:

int
